alert.note: Alert for Inland Sussex; Kent (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 08 at 3:05AM EST until January 10 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Southeast to south winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...In Delaware, Kent and Inland Sussex. In New Jersey, Western Monmouth, Ocean, Cumberland, Atlantic, Cape May and Southeastern Burlington. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening through late Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
